title: Real-time notifications for story status changes
description: As a project manager, I want to receive real-time notifications when user stories change status so that I can immediately respond to blockers and keep stakeholders informed

acceptanceTests.title: Status Change Notifications
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user story status changes from any state to "Blocked", when the change is saved, then all project stakeholders receive a real-time notification within 5 seconds

acceptanceTests.title: Notification Delivery Methods
acceptanceTests.description: Given a notification is triggered, when the system processes the event, then notifications are delivered via WebSocket to active browser sessions and email notifications are sent to offline users

acceptanceTests.title: Notification Content
acceptanceTests.description: Given a status change notification is sent, when the user receives it, then the notification includes story title, old status, new status, and assignee and includes a direct link to the story details

acceptanceTests.title: User Preferences
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user wants to customize notifications, when they access notification settings, then they can enable/disable notifications by story component and choose between immediate, hourly digest, or daily digest delivery
